ResourcePolicy.description: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified table. In IAM, you must provide policy documents in JSON format. However, in CloudFormation you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format because CloudFormation converts YAML to JSON before submitting it to IAM.
ResourcePolicy.markdownDescription:
A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified table. In IAM, you must provide policy documents in JSON format. However, in CloudFormation you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format because CloudFormation converts YAML to JSON before submitting it to IAM.

---

Required: No  
Type: ['object', 'string']  
Update requires: No interruption

TableName.markdownDescription:
The name for the table.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

TableBucketARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified table bucket.
TableBucketARN.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified table bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

TableARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified table.
TableARN.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified table.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Namespace.description: The namespace that the table belongs to.

The namespace that the table belongs to.
